boardgame.name: Cheaty Mages
Cheaty Mages!
Ikasamage!
イカサマージ！
詐賭巫師
boardgame.description: The card game Cheaty Mages puts you in the role of a wizard who has come to watch and bet on monsters fighting in an arena. Of course, you have all of your spells to help the monsters you've bet on win (or harm the monsters fighting against yours) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; but then again, so do all of the other players, too! What's more, judges line the arena during combat and if players push things too far with their cheating spells, a judge might intervene and dispel _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; or even eject _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; the fighter! Who will walk away with the largest pile of gold?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2014 UK Games Expo Best General Card Game Winner
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Ep 010 – Games we always have with us
TGG Episode 55: Game Designer John Welch, Cheaty Mages, Cuba Libre, Numenera, Moonbase Alpha and More!

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: From Japon Brand. Game is in EXCELLENT condition.

New in Shrink. £2.20 postage to UK. I will ship worldwide (please ask, if outside the UK, for a shipping quote before ordering), combine orders for cheaper postage and will give a 3% discount for purchases over £50 and 5% for orders over £100. Please contact me for details. All items (approximately 500 different games) I list are in stock and will be posted within 24 working hours of payment being received.

Cheaty Mages! by Kanai Factory Box: Light shelfwear with a few minor dings, dents, and creases. Overall the box is in excellent condition! Components: Complete and in like new condition! SHIPPING: U.S. shipping will be via USPS Priority Shipping and based on a weight of 2 lbs. from zip code 85208. International buyers are very welcome, but please contact me before buying for a shipping price quote to avoid any surprises or misunderstandings.
Played once.

Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG5803) From across the land spectators come to watch the arena battles of mythic creatures, and many coins hinge on the results! As a powerful mage, you have the chance to influence the outcome through arcane means. But beware! Other practitioners of the arcane may be in attendance as well, and have their money riding on other fighters. Cheaty Mages is a fast and fun betting game from famed Japanese designer Seiji Kanai (Love Letter, Mai Star). Place your bets, play hidden spell cards on fighters, and try to win the most gold in three rounds!
